name: Runster
description:
Runster is an online game for exercise which controlled by your body movement in the real world to elevate both gameplay experience and your health together.

Runster requires only a PC and a smartphone which almost everyone has. So It can do your exercise at home. Each game needs just 10 - 15 minutes for playing to make it easy, fun, and healthy at the same time.

Runster uses accelerometer and gyroscope data from your phone and using gesture detection technology to detect your body movements. Then, it sends the data to the PC to be processed as actions in the gameplay. The player can control their character by their body movement in the real world.
